entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Clearing early this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 5 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Risk of freezing rain late this evening and overnight. Fog patches developing late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Friday 31 March 2023
